Text: Judging by sample...the video is good and the sound is the best so far (no background hiss)...
Just wanna let everyone know- YES! This will play on your PS3. Massive props the people who put this one out, I know it took work.
bullshit still protected by cinavia so sorry to burst your bubble ppl DOES NOT WORK ON PS3!!!! works on pc fine though because pc doesent have cinavia detecters

few small distortions in sound when there are big explosions but their minor, other than that great copy. no clicking or sound levels rising and dropping like the previous copies out there. thanks  for your hard work guys.
